subject: Baseball
Trading Cards
Collectors and Collections
lead_paragraph: Jerry Dworkin of Irvine, Calif., is on the chase to collect all of the 120-plus Mike Piazza Florida Marlins trading cards issued between 1998 and 2005.
snippet: Jerry Dworkin of Irvine, Calif., is on the chase to collect all of the 120-plus Mike Piazza Florida Marlins trading cards issued between 1998 and 2005.
